mapper.select: SELECT `m`.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type, `m`.wip_location, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `pf`.operate_result, `m`.scheduled_expedited, `mp`.finish_date as finish_time,m.qa_check_time FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = #{position_id} AND `pf`.action_time is null AND pf.finish_time is null LEFT JOIN material_process mp ON mp.material_id = m.material_id AND mp.line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 0) ORDER BY operate_result DESC, reception_time

SELECT `m`.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type, `m`.wip_location, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `m`.inline_time, pf.finish_time as quotation_time, `mp`.finish_date as finish_time FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = #{position_id} AND `pf`.operate_result = 2 AND `pf`.finish_time > current_date LEFT JOIN material_process mp ON mp.material_id = m.material_id AND mp.line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 0) ORDER BY quotation_time DESC
